P

ParentBoard - Variable in class chess.Piece
The chess Board that the Piece is stored in
passantItteration - Variable in class pieces.Pawn
Stores the ParentBoard.gameItteration (the turn number) that a Pawn took a 2-step move on
Pawn - Class in pieces
Pawn Class A Pawn is the representation of a pawn chess piece, implementing the abstract methods declared in Piece.
Pawn(int) - Constructor for class pieces.Pawn
Constructor for the Rook class
Piece - Class in chess
Piece Object The Piece abstract class defines the functionality of a Piece of a chess game.

Constructor for the Piece class
pieces - package pieces
 
pos - Variable in class chess.Piece
The Piece's position for it's location on the board Matches the Board's layout's yth xth indexical reference for the Piece.
Position - Class in geometry
Position object The Position class's role to store the location of a Piece's reference inside Board.layout.
Position(int, int) - Constructor for class geometry.Position
Constructor for the Position class.
promotion - Static variable in class chess.Chess.Input
Optional Piece that is supplied when Pawn reaches the other end of the chess Board.
promotion_bar - Variable in class pieces.Pawn
File a Pawn must reach to be promoted.
